api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netflow.p.rapidapi.com/api/products/search/10000279466204"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netflow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://netflow.p.rapidapi.com/api/products/search/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netflow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
